mapper.insert: insert into notice(title, content, postdate, author) values(#{title}, #{content}, now(), #{author})
mapper.select: select * from notice order by postdate desc
mapper.update: update notice set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, postdate=now(), author=#{author} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from notice WHERE id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') OR title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') OR content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') OR postdate LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') order by postdate;
